products.name: Goat Yoga
products.description: Relax and tone your body through yoga while baby goats give you an endorphin dump

products.name: Goat Book Club
products.description: Read some fantastic literature and whenever you get bored just pet some baby goats for a minute!

products.name: Goat Games
products.description: Challenge your friends to some competive video games and bored games. Do you ever really lose when a baby goat is in your lap?

products.name: Goat Jitsu
products.description: The playing field is leveled between black belts and white belts when everyone starts laughing at baby goats.

products.name: Goat Choir
products.description: Harmonize with the best of them and a group of well trained baby goats.
